pages.text: $(li)The Book and Quill will help you to take notes in all your journey.$(br)$(li)You can use it to craft an $(l:patchouli:tools/charm/atlas)Atlas$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
$(li)To use the Book and Quill, first you have to right click while you are holding the item on your hand.

$(li)To save changes, just click in the $(l)Done$() button.$(br)$(li)Finally, if you want to make your book uneditable, click the $(l)Sign$() button, add a title and click the $(l)Sign and Close$() button to confirm it.
